item.title: What Have I Done (this week)?
item.description:
Monday, 08/28

  • wrote up (physically, in a notebook) Aberrant Brand info
  • project page written up for GothFurry (a future project)
  • design drawn for GothFurry

Tuesday, 08/29

  • began writing a php framework entitled “Aberrant Blog”

Wednesday, 08/30

  • continued work on Aberrant Blog

Thursday, 08/31

  • gave up on Aberrant Blog (I’m really really not there yet in terms of skill)

Friday, 09/01

  • drew a shitload of furry sketches
  • revamped Gerhildt’s Patreon (which is mostly about drawing shitloads of furry art)
  • apparently it was #FurryFriday ¯_(ツ)_/¯
  • Linux Mint is Real (I actually rebooted my HP laptop for the first time in seven million years and booted up Mint instead of fuckin’ Windows)

Saturday, 09/02

Sunday, 09/03

  • Saturday & Sunday were Real Dayjob Hours. I didn’t do much else.

item.title: What Have I Done (this week)?
item.description:
Thursday, 08/24

  • new theme for this site
  • first post

Friday, 08/25

  • lots of fun build changes to the site (they were not fun. they were tedious.) if you want more deets on that they’re here
  • some minor color changes to goknba.how’s landing page & added a link to this site
  • Conspiracy Theory watchin’

Saturday, 08/26

  • opened ticket for reimaging of a vps (because apparently I had fucked it up so much that I couldn’t even display .php files)

Sunday, 08/27

  • still waiting for reimaging to finish

item.title: What is This?
item.description:
“Aberrant Media”? The fuck?

This is a #business where I make things.

Media things; stuff you can see or hear (or, if you live close enough, smell and taste).

And maybe feel. Like in your soul. If you have one.

Blame Cristian and Standard Media, if you want to.
